sub_title: Sr. Manager Credit Risk & Collections Manager | EMEA & North America Regions
summary:
I am a knowledgeable and driven Credit Manager with extensive (inter)national B2B experience, working actively with several layers of the business to further develop and manage Working Capital and Credit Risk.

My motto: “PERFORM THE JOB EVERY DAY WELL AND FULL OF PASSION!”

A confident decision maker, solution-oriented and self-starter with a technical savvy attitude. These qualities combined with commitment, sense of responsibility and a mentality to further improve have resulted in many different roles and responsibilities.

Energy I get from looking for solutions, finding ways to put those to work and see the good results from those.

My career journey so far had many successes from actively contributing to cost savings and efficiency improvement exercises with a few of those being; Implemented global Credit policy; Implemented worldwide credit risk management reporting; Centralizing local credit activities to Shared Services Center; Put in place complete Credit Control & Collections team including policies, tools and reporting; Developed, programmed, implemented and maintained automated sophisticated credit and collections managing tool; Credit lead during ERP (SAP) implementations and upgrades; Replaced paper billing documents for electronic invoicing; and more…

Proud am I of my past contributions from hard work and results being recognized by senior management who rewarded me “EMPLOYEE OF THE YEAR 1994” and “TEAM OF THE YEAR 2011”.

I consider having the following expertise; Credit Risk & Collections management; Electronic invoicing; Payment processing; Direct debit; Developing Credit strategies; Management reporting; Credit insurance; Shared services center expertise; Project management; Software programming.

Tooling expertise: SAP, OnGuard, Office (Microsoft), Filemaker (Apple).
